bug.author: CharlesYXW
bug.description: Excuse me, when I try to use train.py to train my own data, I found this problem. My torch is 1.1.0 and I have 4 RTX 2080Ti. Can you help me solve the problem? Thank you!

comments.comment: <denchmark-link:https://github.com/CharlesYXW>@CharlesYXW</denchmark-link> this would seem to be a pytorch issue, which would best be raised on the pytorch repository. See existing also... <denchmark-link:https://github.com/pytorch/examples/issues/467>pytorch/examples#467</denchmark-link>
